subject: Hockey, Ice
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: With N.H.L. teams on track to begin a lockout at midnight Saturday, the highly regarded free-agent forward Shane Doan re-signed with the Phoenix Coyotes.
snippet: With N.H.L. teams on track to begin a lockout at midnight Saturday, the highly regarded free-agent forward Shane Doan re-signed with the Phoenix Coyotes.
